name: Storyboard Mix-and-match Library
description:
Create quick UX design storyboards using the mix-and-match library and template.

Pick and change the character's pose, expression, gestures, and more to fit your scenario. 


Adjust the background and create close-up scenes to describe your solution all from one magic card 🧚‍♀️.

Follow the instructions and use the storyboard template to share your vision with the world.

🚀💃
